document.full_text: president barack obama said on sunday afternoon that the tornado that hit this city of 50,000 people a week ago was a tragedy that will require a national and long-term response.
document.title: obama promises long-term help for joplin
lines_and_colors: president barack obama said on sunday afternoon that the tornado that hit this city of 50,000 people a week ago was a tragedy that will require a national and long-term response.
